backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining product, offer, order, and customer types with demo seeding and storage maps for products, offers, orders, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing no-auth admin mode changes and related frontend file references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing prewritten short summaries for many frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.testing.md: Testing guide describing Vitest and React Testing Library setup for the frontend.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin dashboard layout with navigation, header, unread notifications badge, and outlet content area.
frontend/src/admin/adminNoAuth.ts: Exports a flag enabling temporary admin no-auth mode and a helper to read it.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminAcces: UI card shown when admin access is not initialized, with instructions and a link back to shop.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminGuard: Protects admin routes by checking identity and admin status, handling redirects and loading states with optional no-auth mode.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminUserM: Displays an admin user dropdown with a logout option that clears identity and query cache before navigating home.
frontend/src/admin/notifications/useOrde: Tracks new orders since last seen using localStorage and exposes notifications, unread count, and a mark-all-read function.
Handles admin login flow with Internet Identity, admin validation, redirects, and a special no-auth mode UI.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CustomerDetailP: Shows detailed customer info and order history with navigation and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CustomersListPa: Lists all customers with search, summary stats, and navigation to individual customer pages.
frontend/src/admin/pages/NotificationsFe: Displays order notifications feed with unread count and ability to mark all notifications as read.
frontend/src/admin/pages/OffersManagemen: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, activating, deactivating, and deleting offers with banner upload support.
frontend/src/admin/pages/OrdersDashboard: Displays all orders with sorting, status indicators, and controls to update order status.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ProductsManagem: Admin interface for managing products including creation, editing, deletion, searching, and image upload with progress.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration defining customer and admin route trees with AdminGuard and CartProvider.
frontend/src/customer/cart/CartContext.t: Provides cart state, item management functions, and computed totals via React context.
frontend/src/customer/CustomerLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation, cart badge, footer, and content outlet for customer-facing pages.
frontend/src/customer/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, pricing summary, and checkout navigation or empty-cart message.
frontend/src/customer/pages/CheckoutPage: Checkout form that collects delivery details, submits an order, and navigates to confirmation on success.
frontend/src/customer/pages/OffersPage.t: Displays active promotional offers with banners and dates, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/customer/pages/OrderConfirm: Shows confirmation details for a placed order and provides navigation back to shopping or home.
frontend/src/customer/pages/ProductDetai: Fetches and displays a product’s details, allows quantity selection, and adds items to the cart.
frontend/src/customer/pages/ProductListP: Lists all products with search, loading states, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, user profiles, products, offers, and order mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes using custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/EntryLandingPage.tsx: Implements the landing page with hero banner, CTA to shop, features list, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a styled 404 page with navigation buttons back to home or shop.
frontend/src/test/adminAccessFlow.test.t: Empty test placeholder for admin access flow.
frontend/src/test/customerHappyPath.test: Empty test placeholder for customer happy-path flow.
frontend/src/test/mocks/actorMocks.ts: Empty file intended for backend actor mocks.
frontend/src/test/renderWithProviders.ts: Empty helper placeholder for rendering components with providers for tests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requests, and focus on temporarily disabling admin authentication.
